title: Unresponsive clicking
body: Ever since patch 6.21, I've notice that my champion responds to my clicking really slow and unresponsive. I click to move then quickly click on a minion and my champion follows my movement all the way through then turns to auto attack. Sometimes it doesn't even attack the minion. Just last game I played, I click on a minion and it made me go into bush then auto a different minion. Does anyone know how I can get rid of this? Anyone else have this problem?

replies.body:
Same here... I don't know what I should do to deal with it.

It makes me absolutely unplayable. I saw a lot of boards who wrote about this problem in 2years as well and RIOT still hasn't fixed it.

Please..

It sounds like you're experiencing input delay, which can be caused by lag spikes or packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these matches for an overview of the situation.  Let me know what you find!
